org.ow2.bonita.facade.internal
Interface AbstractRemoteQueryRuntimeAPI

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
EJB2QueryRuntimeAPI, RemoteQueryRuntimeAPI, RESTRemoteQueryRuntimeAPI
public interface AbstractRemoteQueryRuntimeAPI
extends java.rmi.Remote

Getters on workflow recorded data.
Operations in this API applies to main entities managed by Bonita such as:
processes, process instances, activities, tasks.
Returned records are issued from recorded runtime informations (both runtime and archived workflow instances).

Author:
Elias Ricken de Medeiros, Matthieu Chaffotte

 java.util.Collection<TaskInstance> getTaskList(ActivityState taskState, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
          Obtains the user tasks with state either READY or EXECUTING or SUSPENDED or FINISHED for the authenticated user.
If the task has been assigned to a user, only this user can get the task into the returned list.
Otherwise all the users that belong to the candidate list can get the task.

If the task has been assigned to a user, only this user can get the task into the returned list.

getProcessInstances

                                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)

getVariable

java.lang.Object getVariable(ActivityInstanceUUID activityUUID,
                             java.lang.String variableId,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
                             throws ActivityNotFoundException,
                                    VariableNotFoundException,
                                    java.rmi.RemoteException
Obtains a variable for the given activity and variable name. This variable could be local to the activity or global to the process. The activity should either be executed or currently pointed by the a process execution.

For XML Type:

  • getVariable(activityUUID, "myXmlData") returns a Document
  • getVariable(activityUUID, "myXmlData" + BonitaConstants.XPATH_VAR_SEPARATOR + "/root/node") returns a Node
  • getVariable(activityUUID, "myXmlData" + BonitaConstants.XPATH_VAR_SEPARATOR + "/root/@attribute") returns a String
  • getVariable(activityUUID, "myXmlData" + BonitaConstants.XPATH_VAR_SEPARATOR + "/root/text()") returns a String
  • getVariable(activityUUID, "myXmlData" + BonitaConstants.XPATH_VAR_SEPARATOR + anyOtherKindOfXPathExpression) returns a Node

Parameters:
activityUUID - the activity UUID.
variableId - the variable name.
options - the options map (domain, queyList, user)
Returns:
the variable object (can be: a plain String, a Boolean, a Date, a Long or a Double).
Throws:
ActivityNotFoundException
VariableNotFoundException
java.rmi.RemoteException

java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getVariables(ActivityInstanceUUID activityUUID,

                                                                     ActivityNotFoundException,
                                                                     java.rmi.RemoteException
